txt.en: Complete 'Assault on Dhúrstrok' on any difficulty.\n\nUse the Instance Finder to enter Assault on Dhúrstrok.
Complete 'Assault on Dhúrstrok' on any difficulty

'I am in your debt, [placeholder]. I let anger overtake me and cloud my senses. It was unbefitting of me as a leader -- nay, as a dwarf. I selfishly put my own thirst for revenge above the concerns of the Gabil'akkâ.'

He absentmindedly reaches for his beard before realizing that it's no longer there. A tired sigh escapes him.

'At least I have paid dearly for my actions.'

'You've done your part, Shúkurz. Féli will see to it that you and your party are escorted safely out of Gundabad.

'[placeholder], it looks like we'll want a small group of people for this job -- rescuing Lord Náin will go faster. If you have allies who can rally to us quickly, bring them along; if not, we'll work together instead.

'When you're ready, take the lift in the north-east all the way up to the catwalks. Find Dhúrstrok; I'll meet you there.'
You have rescued Náin and brought him back safely to Aslíf.\n\nYou should talk to him.

'Náin's trapped behind a door with two locks. The goblin Mozrúk holds one key, and a troll named Gâdh-and-Shum holds the other.

'Watch out when you're dealing with Mozrúk. He's one of those bat-riders -- got an arsenal of explosives he creates himself.

'Gâdh-and-Shum is a mystery, but there are rumours of him dealing with magic. Even his own kind thinks there's something... unnatural with him.

'They each work in separate wings of Dhúrstrok. I don't know what they're going to do with that dwarf, but you better act fast. He didn't look so well when I saw him.'
Náin's fate is in your hands.
Shúkurz has returned with a wealth of information.\n\nYou should talk to Múta and formulate a plan.
Dhúrstrok is located in the catwalks north-east of Aslíf. The catwalks can be reached through the lift.\n\nMúta will meet you inside Dhúrstrok.
